GSD.product_version: versions from v4.18 to before v4.19.253
GSD.description:
seg6: bpf: fix skb checksum in bpf_push_seg6_encap()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.253 by commit 6d6c8b40ab84cc038b24759ec67176179b19afe2, it was introduced in version v4.18 by commit fe94cc290f535709d3c5ebd1e472dfd0aec7ee79. For more details please see the references link.
